channel.title: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!
channel.description: Well I downloaded a great server, and when you log off, it says could not save for [playername], so like everytime you log in you have to make a new account, and it only auto-saves all profiles every 10min

item.title: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Then something else is screwed up in your server. I suggest getting a new one.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!

item.title: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Eragon Mod Eragon
item.description:
@Mod_Eragon wrote:

it still says could not save for [playername]

Read full topic
item.source: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!

item.title: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

search for case 9154 and under the bracket put the code

case 9154: //Log out { logout(); savemoreinfo(); savecharbackup(); savechar(); }

Read full topic
item.source: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!

item.title: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Eragon Mod Eragon
item.description:
@Mod_Eragon wrote:

Log-out case? :)[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 03:54:12 PM[/size][hr]seems like a dumb question, but where is my logout-case?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 27, 2007, 04:13:15 PM[/size][hr]anyone, where is logout case? server.java,client.java etc etc, and where plz

Read full topic
item.source: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!

item.title: Server Won't Auto-Save when logging off!
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

add this to your logout case

logout(); savemoreinfo();

Read full topic
